pageContent: Purpose of review: Prostate cancer screening has shifted the diagnosis of prostate cancer to lower grade, organ confined disease. Radical prostatectomy or radiation therapy has been shown to be overtreatment in 30% of patients. In this review, we will discuss targeted focal therapy (TFT) using the modalities of cryotherapy or high intensity focused ultrasound as an alternate treatment for low-risk prostate cancers.
